CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: High short - circuit current ( 14.87 mA / cm^2 ) and power conversion efficiency ( 2.71% ) were achieved , which is a significant advance for efficient photovoltaic polymers that respond to the whole range of the solar spectrum .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 14.87 mA / cm^2 |
| 2.71% |
| photovoltaic polymers |

The "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are:

* 14.87 mA / cm^2 (a measure of short-circuit current density)
* 2.71% (a measure of power conversion efficiency)
* photovoltaic polymers (a type of material that responds to the whole range of the solar spectrum)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid "Material Name" entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| photovoltaic polymers |

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, "14.87 mA / cm^2" and "2.71%", are not material names, but rather measures of the material's properties (short-circuit current density and power conversion efficiency, respectively). Therefore, they are not included in the table.

These two properties are relevant to the performance of photovoltaic materials and are clearly mentioned in the paragraph as material properties.
